sourcesContent:
import React,{ useEffect, useRef, useState} from 'react' import { Table,Checkbox,Button} from 'semantic-ui-react'; import '../App.css' const ShowRequest=(props)=> { const[cAddress,setCaddress]=useState(null) const[description,setDes]=useState(null) const[amount,setAmount]=useState(null) const[recipient,setRecp]=useState(null) const[donors,setDonors]=useState(null) const[voters,setVoters]=useState(null) const[completed,setCom]=useState(null) const isInitialMount=useRef(true); const requestTemplate={} const [Requests,setRequests]=useState([]) const requestInfo=async()=>{ const info = await props.contract.methods.getRequeststatus(props.reqNumber).call(); setCaddress(info[6]) setDes(info[5]) setAmount(props.web3.utils.fromWei(info[1])) setCom(info[0]) setVoters(info[3]) setDonors(info[4]) setRecp(info[2]) setRequests([info]) setRequests([...Requests,requestTemplate]) } useEffect(()=>{ requestInfo(); },[props.refresh]) return (
{console.log("reqnumber in showrequest",props.reqNumber)} Request_NO Creator Description: Amount: Recipient: Voters/Donors Payment Completed {Requests.map((request,index) => ( {index} {cAddress} {description} {amount} {recipient} {voters}/{donors} {completed} ) )}
) } export default ShowRequest
